sentences.en: "We're not saying we're outside and above all this," he stresses.
sentences.cn: “我们并不是说我们对此不闻不问,”他强调道.

sentences.en: A mirror hung on a nail above the washstand.
sentences.cn: 脸盆架上方用钉子挂着一面镜子。

sentences.en: Above its doors was a Latin inscription: Non omnia possumus omnes.
sentences.cn: 门的上方刻有拉丁文铭“人非万能”。

sentences.en: branches rained from above.
sentences.cn: 树枝从头顶上雨一般落下。

sentences.en: For additional information, contact any of the above.
sentences.cn: 欲知详情，请与上述任一人联系。

sentences.en: He had a bruise just above his left eye.
sentences.cn: 就在他左眼上方有块瘀伤。

sentences.en: He had to have one leg amputated above the knee.
sentences.cn: 他的一条腿不得不从膝部以上截断。

sentences.en: He lived in a flat above the shop.
sentences.cn: 他住在那商店上面的一套房间里。

sentences.en: he was concerned above all to speak the truth.
sentences.cn: 他最关心的是说实话。

sentences.en: he was not above practical jokes.
sentences.cn: 他甚至甘愿搞恶作剧。

sentences.en: I decided to crop the picture just above the water line.
sentences.cn: 我决定把这张照片水印以下的部分裁掉。

sentences.en: I heard a strange noise coming from the room above.
sentences.cn: 我听见楼上房间传来奇怪的响声。

sentences.en: I want to be honest, honest above everything else.
sentences.cn: 我想要做到诚实，一切以诚实为上。

sentences.en: Joan Smith's detective stories are a cut above the rest.
sentences.cn: 琼·史密斯的侦探小说比其他侦探小说都要出色。

sentences.en: Our office is above the hairdresser’s.
sentences.cn: 我们的办公室在理发店上面。

sentences.en: Several conclusions could be drawn from the results described above.
sentences.cn: 从上文描述的结果中可以得出几个结论。

sentences.en: She wore a checked shirt tied in a knot above the navel.
sentences.cn: 她身穿一件格子衬衫，衣角在肚脐上方打了个结。

sentences.en: That big high-rise above us is where Brian lives.
sentences.cn: 我们上面的那座摩天大楼就是布赖恩住的地方。

sentences.en: The airliner flew above the clouds.
sentences.cn: 大型客机在云层上面飞行。

sentences.en: The great bird hovered high above our heads.
sentences.cn: 那只大鸟在我们头顶上方的高处盘旋。

sentences.en: The hills rise green and sheer above the broad river.
sentences.cn: 这些小山碧绿陡峭，矗立在这条宽阔的河流之上。

sentences.en: The salaries we offer are well above (= much higher than ) average.
sentences.cn: 我们提供的薪资远高于平均水平。

sentences.en: There was a deep crack in the ceiling above him.
sentences.cn: 在他头顶的天花板上有一道很深的裂缝。

sentences.en: There was a drift of smoke above the trees.
sentences.cn: 树林上空飘浮着一股烟。

sentences.en: Victoria Falls has had above average levels of rainfall this year.
sentences.cn: 维多利亚瀑布今年的降雨量超过了平均水平。

sentences.en: Viewed from above, the valleys form the shape of a man.
sentences.cn: 从上往下俯瞰，山谷呈现出人形轮廓。

phrases.tran_cn: 变得自高自大；自视甚高

phrases.phrase: not be above over and above

trans.tran_en: used in a piece of writing to refer to something mentioned in an earlier part of the same piece of writing
in a higher position than something else
in a higher position than something else

trans.tran_cn: 在/向…上面，超过，（因善良或诚实正直而）不至于
trans.tran_en: in a higher position than something else
